languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one of the {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas. For 1 round, all allies within the range of {uip|Range|7005fbf810a64264893cd18fc0187b39} cells gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to move to that area. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
languages.original_text: Великий {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}стратег{/g} выбирает одну из зон Стратегического плана. На 1 раунд все союзники в радиусе {uip|Range|7005fbf810a64264893cd18fc0187b39} клеток получают {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} переместиться в эту зону. Это перемещение не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g} и не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Strategist chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For one round, all allies gain the ability to move to that area within the range of (Strategist 's INT+FEL bonus) cells. This movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity and does not spend MP.

The Strategist chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 round, all allies within the range of (Strategist 's INT + FEL bonus) cells gain the ability to move to that area. This movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity and does not spend MP.

This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

Стратег выбирает одну из зон Стратегического плана. На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} все союзники в радиусе ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ИНТ + ОБЩ стратега) клеток получают {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} переместиться в эту зону. Это перемещение не провоцирует атаки по возможности и не требует затрат ОП.

Стратег выбирает одну из зон Стратегического плана. На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} все союзники в радиусе {uip|Range|7005fbf810a64264893cd18fc0187b39} клеток получают {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} переместиться в эту зону. Это перемещение не провоцирует атаки по возможности и не требует затрат ОП.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}选择一片{g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}战斗策略{/g}区域。在一轮内，所有与战略大师之间的距离不超过{uip|Range|7005fbf810a64264893cd18fc0187b39}格的盟友，都可以获得特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，可直接移动至该片区域内。此次移动不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}，也不会消耗{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。

For 1 round, all allies within the range of {uip|Range|7005fbf810a64264893cd18fc0187b39} cells gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to move to that area. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 战略大师选择一片战斗策略区域。在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，所有与战略大师之间的{g|Encyclopedia:Range}距离{/g}不超过（战略大师的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）格的盟友，都可以获得{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，可直接移动至该片区域内。此次移动不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}，也不会消耗{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}gran estratega{/g} elige una de las zonas designadas por {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tácticas de combate{/g}. Durante 1 asalto, todos los aliados que estén dentro de un alcance máximo de {uip|Range|7005fbf810a64264893cd18fc0187b39} casillas adquieren la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de moverse hasta esa zona. Este movimiento no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g} ni gasta {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstratege{/g} wählt eines der {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Gefechtstaktiken{/g}-Gebiete aus. Eine Runde lang erhalten sämtliche Verbündeten innerhalb einer Reichweite von {uip|Range|7005fbf810a64264893cd18fc0187b39} Feldern die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, sich in dieses Gebiet zu bewegen. Diese Bewegungen provozieren keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} und kosten auch keine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstratege{/g} wählt eines der Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiete aus. Eine {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang erhalten sämtliche Verbündeten innerhalb einer {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Reichweite{/g} von {uip|Range|7005fbf810a64264893cd18fc0187b39} Feldern die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, sich in dieses Gebiet zu bewegen. Diese Bewegungen provozieren keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} und kosten auch keine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.

Der Stratege wählt eines der Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiete aus. Eine {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang erhalten sämtliche Verbündeten innerhalb einer {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Reichweite{/g} von {uip|Range|7005fbf810a64264893cd18fc0187b39} Zellen die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, sich in dieses Gebiet zu bewegen. Diese Bewegungen provozieren keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Überraschungsangriffe{/g} und kosten auch keine {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}grand stratège{/g} choisit l'une des zones de {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tactiques de combat{/g}. Pendant 1 round, tous les alliés situés à une distance de {uip|Range|7005fbf810a64264893cd18fc0187b39} cases obtiennent la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de rejoindre cette zone. Ce déplacement ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g} et ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} chooses one of the {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas. For 1 round, all allies within the range of {uip|Range|7005fbf810a64264893cd18fc0187b39} cells gain the {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to move to that area. This movement does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and does not spend {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le Stratège choisit l'une des zones de Tactiques de Combat. Pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, tous les alliés situés à une {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distance{/g} de ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} du Stratège) cases acquièrent la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de rejoindre cette zone. Ce déplacement ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g} et ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.

Le Stratège choisit l'une des zones de Tactiques de Combat. Pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, tous les alliés situés à une {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distance{/g} de {uip|Range|7005fbf810a64264893cd18fc0187b39} cases acquièrent la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de rejoindre cette zone. Ce déplacement ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaques d'opportunité{/g} et ne coûte aucun {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}大戦略家{/g}は軍略エリアをひとつ選択する。1ラウンドの間、その{uip|Range|7005fbf810a64264893cd18fc0187b39}セルの射程内のすべての味方は、そのエリアへと移動する{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を得る。この移動は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発せず、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を消費しない。

戦略家は軍略範囲をひとつ選択する。1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、その{uip|Range|7005fbf810a64264893cd18fc0187b39}の{g|Encyclopedia:Range}射程{/g}内のすべての味方は、その範囲へと移動する{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を得る。この移動は{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を誘発せず、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を消費しない。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Büyük Stratejist{/g}, {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Çatışma Taktikleri{/g} alanlarından birini seçer. {uip|Range|7005fbf810a64264893cd18fc0187b39} hücrelik menzil içinde bulunan tüm dost birimler, 1 rauntluğuna o alana hareket etme {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} kazanırlar. Bu hareket, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez ve {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} harcamaz.
